english_example_sentence: When we didn't learn the lesson, we repeated it
russian_example_sentence: Когда мы не учили урок, мы повторили его
turkish_example_sentence: Biz karmaşık kimya formüllerini öğrenmediğimizde, dersi tekrar ettik
